DOC.brief_summary: To compare the early visual results and postoperative recovery between two groups of keratoconic patients - one group having undergone a traditional, mechanical vacuum trephine procedure while the second group underwent femtosecond-enabled penetrating keratoplasty.
DOC.brief_title: Outcomes in a Comparison of Manual Penetrating Keratoplasty and the IntraLaseÂ® Enabled Keratoplasty
DOC.criteria: Patients older than 18 years old, with keratoconus and corneal transplant indication Exclusion criteria included different ocular pathology and a potential visual acuity of less than 20/40
